descriptionHtml:
=======DWEMER RIFLE=======

This is a new custom weapon I made based on the Dwemers\' technology.
It has custom sounds for draw/charge/fire.
Resembling a rifle, it shoots projectiles at high speed.
You can put it to either hand! It sure looks nice when duel wielded, be a Desperado.

=======LOCATION=======

You can obtain it by doing a quest. To start it, go to the place where Calcemo stands in Markarth, right when you enter the Understone Keep, it\'s the entrance on the left. His Journal is located nearby, in a place with dwemer stuff. Read his Journal, that\'ll start the quest.

=======INFO=======

Perk: Archery

Version 1.4: Animation and Damage Fix.

Known Bugs:
-Bullets are sometimes attached to the target\'s body. It\'s kinda funny. Fix being worked on.


=======CHANGELOG V 1.4=======

Improved damage.
Fixed some animations issue.
Moved Calcemo\'s Journal to a more visible place.
Added stagger probabilty. Works better with Archery Perks (I suppose)


=======FUTURE CHANGES=======

Detailed quest.
New animations (If I get someone to help me out)
Weapon Improvement at the Grindstone
Muzzle flash
Two-Handed version
Fix conflict bugs

=======MEDIA=======

http://www.youtube.com/RqoCBWRErag

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ojmzfy83_Vo

(Couldn\'t put it embed)

=======CREDITS=======

Credit to the original model goes to 3dregenerator from the website thefree3dmodels.com
author: EdgyBluz
